0110100101011010 0110010011110110 1 -> sum: 1100111001010001, cout: 0
0101011010010001 0101000110010101 1 -> sum: 1010100000100111, cout: 0
1010101000011111 0010101100011111 0 -> sum: 1101010100111110, cout: 0

1011110101100011 1011100111001001 0 -> sum: 0111011100101100, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
